name: eslint-code-reviewer
description: A Claude Code skill that automatically validates and fixes code quality issues in git changed files using ESLint configuration

skills.name: eslint-reviewer
skills.description: Automatically validates and fixes code using ESLint rules. Detects changed files in git, runs ESLint validation, and can automatically fix issues. IMPORTANT: This skill ONLY runs if the user's project has an ESLint configuration file.
